meanings.definition: A bus powered by electricity from overhead wires.
meanings.sent1: The trolleybuses in the city are quiet and eco-friendly.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer taking trolleybuses for their daily commute.
meanings.sent3: The trolleybuses had a party, and the wires were the dance floor!
meanings.sent4: The trolleybuses glided through the streets like graceful swans.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the trolleybuses humming along the wires was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Buses that draw power from overhead wires using trolley poles.
meanings.sent1: The trolleybuses stopped smoothly to pick up passengers.
meanings.sent2: The city invested in new trolleybuses to improve public transportation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the trolleybuses always carry umbrellas? In case of a power shower!
meanings.sent4: The trolleybuses connected to the wires like a lifeline to power.
meanings.sent5: The trolleybuses hummed a tune as they traveled along the electric lines.
